channel.title: The new tickle me elmo..scary or not?
channel.description: ok, so my little cousin got the new damned Tickle Me Elmo.....and it came in this little safe box like thing..and everytime you would open it..it would talk and one time it said "ah ah ah NO PEEKING" i was like...wtf???? so i became scared of that stupid box..then when my cousin took him out and played with for the first time...i was like oly shit!!! THAT "DOLL" STANDS UP BY ITS FUCKING SELF!!!0.0 then after that the little damn red devil bastard began to remind me of Chucky from the Child Play movies...i can imangine that little bastard grabbing a knife and plunging it into someones neck screamin "HAHAHAHA!!! YOU TICKLED ELMO..NOW DIE!!!!!" now i dont even want to be in the same room with that damn thing...with its eyes looking at me....i swear, if that thing kills something..id prefer it be my sisters dog..god i hate that dog...so yeah, lol...i wanna now if tickle me elmo scares you too...

item.title: The new tickle me elmo..scary or not?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I’ve never heard of one since today, and I must say, they are FUCKING CUTE AND FUNNY!

Rictoo:

[quote=Wikipedia]Even the box it comes in is designed so that the doll can not be seen without purchasing it. A preview flap is included, but upon opening, you see Elmo’s eyes. He says “Ah, ah, ah, ah! No peeking!” and giggles.

Don’t worry, if you’re afraid of it, just look at this. LOOL[/quote]

HAHAHAHAAHHAHAAH!!! So, SO SO SO FUNNY!

Read full topic

item.title: The new tickle me elmo..scary or not?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

HeWhoOpensADoor:

you know whats even scarier…well…two things…the spanish tickle me elmo makes me shiver with fear…if you thought the english versions laugh was scary…listen to the spanish one…sounds frickin DEMONIC and PHYSCOITIC 0.0…also, Tickle me elmo is a bleak image of the future, if we keep upgrading DOLLS…and thats what they are D-O-L-L-S not fricking robots…some day some dumbass is going to come up with the idea “hey! lets give Tickle Me Elmo a mind of its own!” and it will pass…then earth and the human civilization will become the slave bitches of one TICKLE ME fucking ELMO…

Another baby dropped on his head?

Read full topic

item.title: The new tickle me elmo..scary or not?
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

Kevin Clash… my new hero:

en.wikipedia.org

Kevin Clash

Kevin Jeffrey Clash (born September 17, 1960) is an American puppeteer, director and producer whose characters included Elmo, Clifford, Benny Rabbit, and Hoots the Owl. Clash developed an interest in puppetry at an early age and, in his teen years, performed for local TV children's shows in his hometown of Baltimore, Maryland. He joined the cast of Captain Kangaroo in the early 1980s and began performing on Sesame Street in 1984. He was the fifth puppeteer to perform Elmo, who became his signa...
